name: PHASEGroupPreset
desc: A collection of settings for groups.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine, settings: [String : PHASEGroupPresetSetting], timeToTarget: Double, timeToReset: Double)
items.desc: Creates a group preset with the designated engine, settings, and fade parameters.

items.name: var settings: [String : PHASEGroupPresetSetting]
items.desc: A dictionary with preset setting values and group objects as keys.

items.name: var timeToTarget: Double
items.desc: A duration in which the engine fades the settings from their original value to their new value.

items.name: var timeToReset: Double
items.desc: A duration in which the framework restores the group’s original state.

items.name: func activate()
items.desc: Applies settings to the designated groups.

items.name: func activate(timeToTargetOverride: Double)
items.desc: Applies settings with an overriden fade duration.

items.name: func deactivate()
items.desc: Reverts settings for the preset's groups.

items.name: func deactivate(timeToResetOverride: Double)
items.desc: Reverts settings for the preset’s groups using a timed adjustment.
